description:
Jiyu Nanohana, a fourteen-year old junior high school student who attends Hontsuru Jr.High.  One day, she unexpectedly meets Koinosuke Odago, an assistant of Yagyu Jubei who has searched 300 years for a worthy successor for the Lovely Eyepatch. He wants Jiyu to take over the position but will she?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La naissance de Yagyu Jubei II
Ni Dai Me Yagyuu Juubee Tanjou
The Birth of Yagyu Jubei II
二代目柳生十兵衛 誕生
